Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2014 10:07PM Krisi888 wrote: its going to be hard on you and on her, but you are sisters, and that bond is always there. Tell her, shes stronger than you think - also get her to do the genetic testing - even though i have had 3 aunties die breast cancer and numerous cousins have breasts removed here on New Zealand unless you actually have cancer yourself u cannot have the genetic testing done.  My love and thoughts go out to you both.
